snippet: A Chrysler initial public offering would cost Fiat time and money better spent on integrating the companies. It’s time for the chief executive, Sergio Marchionne, to increase his offer for the remaining stake.
abstract: A Chrysler initial public offering would cost Fiat time and money better spent on integrating the companies. It’s time for the chief executive, Sergio Marchionne, to increase his offer for the remaining stake.
